title: The Happily Never After Boxed Set
description: A Naughty Fairy Tale Series from New York Times Bestselling Author, HP Mallory and Plum PascalFairy Tale Princesses Like You’ve Never Seen Them Before… 10 Champions destined to defeat an evil that threatens to wipe out the land of Fantasia.Find out what happens when…Snow White meets three sinfully sexy dragon shifters,Goldilocks goes up against three bear shifters,The Little Mermaid saves Captain Hook,Rose Red is rescued from her evil uncle by three handsome huntsmen,And Sleeping Beauty is awoken by the man who murdered her entire family…The Happily Never After Series Snow White, Goldilocks, Rose Red, Sleeping Beauty, Tinkerbell, Cinderella, Bo Peep, Belle, The Little Mermaid, & Red Riding Hood and a slew of sexy men!Included in this boxed set1. Snow2. Goldy3. Aria4. Rose5. Briar
author: Plum Pascal
